original_title: Blue Man Group: How to Be a Megastar Live!
overview: How To Be A Megastar Tour 2.0. Blue Man Group s inventive new how-to-manual, which expands on the Rock Concert Manual concept from The Complex Rock Tour, will take you through the steps of a wildly clever and interactive show that offers unique all-ages appeal.
title: Blue Man Group: How to Be a Megastar Live!
